description: This dashboard works with postgres_exporter for prometheus

panels.title: General Counters, CPU, Memory and File Descriptor Stats

targets.expr: sum by (namespace, pod, state, datname) (pg_stat_activity_count{cluster="$cluster", datname=~"$datname", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", state="active"})

sum by (namespace, pod, state, datname) (pg_stat_activity_count{cluster="$cluster", datname=~"$datname", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", state=~"idle|idle in transaction|idle in transaction (aborted)"})

panels.description: Number of rows fetched by queries in this database
panels.title: Fetch data rate (SELECT)

panels.description: Number of rows updated by queries in this database
panels.title: Update data rate (UPDATE)

panels.description: Number of rows inserted by queries in this database
panels.title: Insert data rate (INSERT)

panels.description: Number of rows deleted by queries in this database
panels.title: Delete data rate (DELETE)

targets.expr: pg_stat_database_blks_hit{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", datname=~"$datname"} / (pg_stat_database_blks_read{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", datname=~"$datname"} + pg_stat_database_blks_hit{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", datname=~"$datname"})

panels.description: Total amount of data written to temporary files by queries in this database. All temporary files are counted, regardless of why the temporary file was created, and regardless of the log_temp_files setting.
panels.title: Temp File (Bytes)

targets.legendFormat: write_time - Total amount of time that has been spent in the portion of checkpoint processing where files are written to disk.
sync_time - Total amount of time that has been spent in the portion of checkpoint processing where files are synchronized to disk.

panels.description: Total amount of disk usages per database.
panels.title: Database size

title: Services / PostgreSQL
